query:
WITH query_result AS (
            SELECT
                *
            FROM
                paystack_banks
            ORDER BY
                name DESC
            OFFSET ($1 - 1) * $2
            LIMIT $2
        ),
        total_count AS (
            SELECT
                COUNT(id) AS total_rows
            FROM
                paystack_banks
        )
        SELECT 
            COALESCE(JSONB_AGG(query_result), '[]'::JSONB) AS items,
            JSONB_BUILD_OBJECT(
                'page', $1,
                'per_page', $2,
                'total', (SELECT total_rows FROM total_count)
            ) AS meta
        FROM
            query_result,
            total_count
